Monitor da disciplina de Fundamentos de Modelagem Computacional do Mestrado em Modelagem Computacional do Conhecimento da UFAL. Ementa: Fundamentos de teoria da computaзгo e algoritmos. Pontos de equilнbrio. Otimizaзгo e controle. Validaзгo de modelos. Enfoque probabilнstico: dinвmica probabilнstica, processos evolucionбrios. Sinais e sistemas, espectros. Anбlise de multiresoluзгo.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: AL-MG-RJ: Projeto e Desenvolvimento de Redes de Sensores sem Fios (AUX-PE-PROCAD-NF 2332/2008)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Este projeto tem por objetivo criar as condiзхes ideais para (i) consolidar as atividades de pesquisa no вmbito do Programa de Pуs-Graduaзгo em Modelagem Computacional de Conhecimento da Universidade Federal de Alagoas (UFAL); (ii) estimular a interaзгo cientнfico-acadкmica de modo a constituir uma rede de cooperaзгo com a Pontifнcia Universidade Catуlica do Rio de Janeiro e a Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais; (iii) estimular o fortalecimento da бreas de Modelos Quantitativos e de Simulaзгo dentro do Programa de pуs-graduaзгo sediado na UFAL; (iv) contribuir para o equilнbrio regional da pуs-graduaзгo brasileira, fortalecendo a linha quantitativa do Programa de pуs-graduaзгo sediado na UFAL; (v) ampliar a formaзгo de mestres e doutores e a produзгo cientнfico-acadкmica; (vi) apoiar o desenvolvimento de projetos de pesquisa conjuntos na бrea de redes de sensores; (vii) promover a mobilizaзгo de docentes/pesquisadores e estudantes de pуs-graduaзгo entre os grupos de pesquisa envolvidos no projeto..

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Este projeto tem por objetivo criar as condiзхes ideais para a consolidaзгo das atividades de pesquisa no вmbito do Programa de Pуs-Graduaзгo em Modelagem Computacional de Conhecimento da Universidade Federal de Alagoas (UFAL) atravйs de aзхes tendentes a (i) melhorar a infra-estrutura computacional de seus laboratуrios de pesquisa, (ii) ampliar o acesso ao conhecimento mais atualizado atravйs da aquisiзгo de literatura de ponta, (iii) ampliaзгo do espaзo fнsico de apoio а pesquisa e (iv) fortalecimento de parcerias com pesquisadores de notada atuaзгo cientнfica. A proposta estб estrutura em dois subprojetos, um com a Pontifнcia Universidade Catуlica do Rio de Janeiro (PUC-Rio) e outro com a Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (UFMG).

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: SILVA JЪNIOR, G. P.;G. P. SILVA, JUNIOR;SILVA, G. P.;Silva;SILVA, GILBERTO P.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: MASSAYO - A Semantic Web-based Educational Platform
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Intelligent Tutoring Systems (ITS) are inherently complex, domain-oriented software systems which are frequently pointed out by researchers as suitable applications for the multi-agent approach. Developing and maintaining Multi-agent ITS are a hard task since it involves different stakeholders, with different expert and roles, such as developers, for developing new software features; domain experts, for managing ITS knowledge domain; authors, for customizing ITS execution for a given context; and users, which are not aware about ITS complexity and require a friendly user interface to interact with the system. Some works have been proposed to support the development of ITS, but they do not consider the stakeholders involved in the whole development and maintenance processes. In this project we present a software framework for designing, developing, and maintenance of Multi-agent ITS. This framework aims to be useful to ITS developers, domain experts, authors and users, providing a different view for each stakeholder, with different tools to support their activities. The focus here is more on developers and describe the framework architecture, design, and extension points, detailing how to customize them for specific domains.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Intelligent Tutoring Systems (ITS) are inherently complex, domain-oriented software systems which are frequently pointed out by researchers as suitable applications for the multi-agent approach. Developing and maintaining Multi-agent ITS are a hard task since it involves different stakeholders, with different expert and roles, such as developers, for developing new software features; domain experts, for managing ITS knowledge domain; authors, for customizing ITS execution for a given context; and users, which are not aware about ITS complexity and require a friendly user interface to interact with the system. Some works have been proposed to support the development of ITS, but they do not consider the stakeholders involved in the whole development and maintenance processes. In this project we present a software framework for designing, developing, and maintenance of Multi-agent ITS. This framework aims to be useful to ITS developers, domain experts, authors and users, providing a different view for each stakeholder, with different tools to support their activities. The focus here is more on developers and describe the framework architecture, design, and extension points, detailing how to customize them for specific domains.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: MASSAYO - A Semantic Web-based Educational Platform

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Classification of Amazonian Lakes by their Shape using Infrared Remote Sensing

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: The Fourth Chilean Workshop on Pattern Recognition (CWPR 2012)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In this paper we propose a technique of image analysis in order to categorize lakes of the Amazon River basin. The images studied are generated by the sensor CBERS, and the procedure is to extract edges, in order to get features from these edges and classify them into one of a known number of classes. The classification process is made by maximum likelihood Gaussian classifier, and the best features in terms of expressiveness and computational cost are identified by an exhaustive search.
